    decrement: function() {

    },

      return privateCounter;
    }
  }  
};

function BubbleSort(arr){
	for(var i=0;i<arr.length-1;i++){
		for(var j=0;j<arr.length-1-i;j++){
			if(arr[j]>arr[j+1]){
				var temp=arr[j];
				arr[j]=arr[j+1];
				arr[j+1]=temp;
			}
		}
	}
	return arr;
}

function SelectSort(arr){
	for(var i=0;i<arr.length-1;i++){
		var minIndex=i;
		for(var j=i+1;j<arr.length;j++){
			if(arr[j]<arr[minIndex]){

		var temp=arr[i];

		arr[minIndex]=temp;
	}
	return arr;
}

function QuickSort(arr){
	if(arr.length<2){
		return arr;
	}
	//ä¸­é—´åŸºå‡†å€¼
	var pivotIndex=Math.floor(arr.length/2);
	var pivot=arr.splice(pivotIndex,1)[0];
	var left=[],right=[];
	for(var i=0;i<arr.length;i++){
    	if(arr[i]<pivot){
    		left.push(arr[i]);
    	}else{
    		right.push(arr[i]);
    	}
    }
    return QuickSort(left).concat([pivot],QuickSort(right));
}

function HeapSort(arr){
	//ä»ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªéå¶å­èŠ‚ç‚¹ä»ä¸‹è‡³ä¸Šï¼Œä»å³è‡³å·¦è°ƒæ•´ç»“æ„
	for(var i=arr.length/2-1;i>=0;i--){
		adjustHeap(arr,k,arr.length);
	}
	for(var j=arr.length-1;j>0;j--){
		//äº¤æ¢æ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ä¸æœ«å°¾å…ƒç´ 
		var temp=arr[j];
		arr[j]=arr[0];
		arr[0]=temp;
		adjustHeap(arr,0,j);
	}
	return arr;
}

function adjustHeap(arr,i,length){
	//å–å‡ºå½“å‰å…ƒç´ 
	var current=arr[i];
	//ä»iç»“ç‚¹çš„å·¦å­ç»“ç‚¹å¼€å§‹ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯2i+1å¤„å¼€å§‹
	for(var k=i*2+1;k<length;k=k*2+1){
		//å¦‚æœå·¦å­ç»“ç‚¹å°äºå³å­ç»“ç‚¹ï¼ŒkæŒ‡å‘å³å­ç»“ç‚¹
		if(k+1<length&&arr[k]<arr[k+1]){
			k++;

		//å¦‚æœå­èŠ‚ç‚¹å¤§äºçˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå°†å­èŠ‚ç‚¹å€¼èµ‹ç»™çˆ¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼ˆä¸ç”¨è¿›è¡Œäº¤æ¢ï¼‰
		if(arr[k]>current){
			arr[i]=arr[k];
			i=k;
		}else{
			break;
		}
	}
	arr[i]=current;
}

function MergeSort(arr){
	if(arr.lenth<2){
		return arr;
	}
	var mid=Math.floor(arr.length/2);
	var left=arr.slice(0,mid);
	var right=arr.slice(mid);
	return mergeArray(MergeSort(left),mergeArray(right));
}
//åˆå¹¶å·¦å³æ•°ç»„
function mergeArray(l,r){
	var res=[];
	var i=0,j=0;
	while(i<l.length&&j<r.length){
		if(l[i]<b[i]){
			res.push(l[i]);
			i++;
		}else{
			res.push(r[j]);
			j++;
		}
	}
	if(i==l.length){
		res=res.concat(r.slice(j));
	}
	if(j==r.length){
		res=res.concat(l.slice(i));
	}
	return res;
}

å‰åºâ€“leetcode144

æ€è·¯

  1. é‡‡ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªè¾…åŠ©æ ˆstackï¼Œå°†å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹rootå‹å…¥æ ˆä¸­ã€‚
  2. ä»stackå¼¹å‡ºæ ˆé¡¶èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¹¶æ”¾å…¥è¿”å›æ•°ç»„ï¼Œå°†èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„å³å­©å­ï¼Œå·¦å­©å­å‹å…¥æ ˆã€‚

ä»£ç 

/**
 * Definition for a binary tree node.
 * function TreeNode(val) {
 *     this.val = val;
 *     this.left = this.right = null;
 * }
 */
/**
 * @param {TreeNode} root
 * @return {number[]}
 */
var preorderTraversal = function(root) {
    var res=[];
    var stack=[];
    if(root==null){
        return [];
    }
    stack.push(root);
    while(stack.length){
        root=stack.pop();
        res.push(root.val);
        if(root.right!=null){
            stack.push(root.right)
        }
        if(root.left){
            stack.push(root.left)
        }
    }
    return res;
};

ä¸­åºâ€“leetcode94

æ€è·¯

  1. ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªè¾…åŠ©æ ˆstack

  3. é‡å¤æ­¥éª¤2ï¼Œç›´åˆ°root==null,ä»stackå¼¹å‡ºæ ˆé¡¶å…ƒç´ ï¼Œæ”¾å…¥è¿”å›æ•°ç»„ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”root=root.right

var inorderTraversal = function(root) {
    var stack=[];
    var res=[];
    while(stack.length||root!=null){
        if(root!=null){
            stack.push(root);
            root=root.left;
        }else{
            root=stack.pop();
            res.push(root.val);
            root=root.right;
        }
    }
    return res;
};

var postorderTraversal = function(root) {
    if(root==null){
        return [];
    }
    var res=[],s1=[],s2=[];
    s1.push(root);
    while(s1.length){
        root=s1.pop();
        s2.push(root);
        if(root.left){
            s1.push(root.left);
        }
        if(root.right){
            s1.push(root.right);
        }
    }
    while(s2.length){
        res.push(s2.pop().val);
    }
    return res;
};

var levelOrder = function(root) {
    if(root==null){
        return [];
    }
    var queue=[],res=[];
    queue.push(root);
    while(queue.length){
        var len=queue.length;
        var temp=[];
        for(var i=0;i<len;i++){
            var node=queue.shift();
            temp.push(node.val);
            if(node.left){
                queue.push(node.left);
            }
            if(node.right){
                queue.push(node.right);
            }
        }
        res.push(temp);
    }
    return res;
};

var zigzagLevelOrder = function(root) {
    if(root==null){
        return [];
    }
    var queue=[],res=[],flag=true;
    queue.push(root);
    while(queue.length){
        var temp=[];
        var len=queue.length;
        for(var i=0;i<len;i++){
            var node=queue.shift();
            temp.push(node.val);
            if(node.left){
                queue.push(node.left);
            }
            if(node.right){
                queue.push(node.right);
            }
        }
        if(!flag){
            temp.reverse();
        }
        flag=!flag;
        res.push(temp);
    }
    return res;
};

	var fragment=document.createDocumentFragment();
	for(var i=1;i<=100;i++){
		var div=document.createElement('div');
		if(i%4==1){
			div.style.backgroundColor='red';
		}
		if(i%4==2){
			div.style.backgroundColor='yellow';
		}
		if(i%4==3){
			div.style.backgroundColor='blue';
		}
		if(i%4==0){
			div.style.backgroundColor='green';
		}
		div.appendChild(document.createTextNode(''+i));
		fragment.appendChild(div);
	}
	document.body.appendChild(fragment);	  
</script>
</body>
</html>

entry.content:
é¢˜ç›®

ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸² sï¼Œæ‰¾åˆ° s ä¸­æœ€é•¿çš„å›æ–‡å­ä¸²ã€‚ä½ å¯ä»¥å‡è®¾ s çš„æœ€å¤§é•¿åº¦ä¸º1000ã€‚
ç¤ºä¾‹ 1ï¼š

ç¤ºä¾‹ 2ï¼š

æ€è·¯

åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’

åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸€å­—æ¯å’ŒäºŒå­—æ¯çš„å›æ–‡ï¼Œç„¶åæ‰¾åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰ä¸‰å­—æ¯å›æ–‡ï¼Œå¹¶ä¾æ­¤ç±»æ¨ã€‚

var longestPalindrome = function(s) {
    var start=0;
    var maxLength=1;
    var len=s.length;
    if(s.length<2){
        return s;
    }
    var dp=new Array(len);
    for(var k=0;k<dp.length;k++){
        dp[k]=new Array(len);
    }
    for(var i=0;i<len;i++){
        dp[i][i]=true;
        if(i<len-1&&s.charAt(i)==s.charAt(i+1)){
            dp[i][i+1]=true;
            start=i;
            maxLength=2;
        }
    }
    for(var strlen=3;strlen<len;strlen++){
        for(var i=0;i<=len-strlen;i++){
            var j=i+strlen-1;
            if(dp[i+1][j-1]&&s.charAt(i)==s.charAt(j)){
                dp[i][j]=true;
                start=i;
                maxLength=strlen;
            }
        }
    }
    return s.substring(start,start+maxLength);
}

ä¸­å¿ƒæ‰©å±•ç®—æ³•

å›æ–‡ä¸­å¿ƒçš„ä¸¤ä¾§äº’ä¸ºé•œåƒï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å›æ–‡å¯ä»¥ä»ä»–çš„ä¸­å¿ƒå±•å¼€ï¼Œæœ‰$2n-1$ä¸ªè¿™æ ·çš„ä¸­å¿ƒï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬å­—æ¯å’Œå­—æ¯ä¹‹é—´ï¼‰
å–ä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹å‘ä¸¤è¾¹æ‰©æ•£çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ±‚å‡ºå…¶æ»¡è¶³å›æ–‡çš„é•¿åº¦ã€‚

var longestPalindrome = function(s) {
    if (s === '') {
        return '';
    }
    let start = 0, end = 0;
    for (let i = 0; i < s.length; i++) {
        let len1 = calc(s, i, i);
        let len2 = calc(s, i, i + 1);
        let len = Math.max(len1, len2);
        
        if (len > end - start) {
            start = i - Math.floor((len - 1) / 2);
            end = i + Math.floor(len / 2);
        }
    }
    return s.substring(start, end + 1);
};
function calc(s, i, j) {
    while (i > -1 && j < s.length && s[i] === s[j]) {
        --i;
        ++j;
    }
    return j - i - 1;
}
entry.summary: é¢˜ç›® ç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸² sï¼Œæ‰¾åˆ° s ä¸­æœ€é•¿çš„å›æ–‡å­ä¸²ã€‚ä½ å¯ä»¥å‡è®¾ s çš„æœ€å¤§é•¿åº¦ä¸º1000ã€‚ ç¤ºä¾‹ 1ï¼š è¾“å…¥: â€œbabadâ€ è¾“å‡º: â€œbabâ€ æ³¨æ„: â€œabaâ€ä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰æ•ˆç­”æ¡ˆã€‚ ç¤ºä¾‹ 2ï¼š è¾“å…¥: â€œcbbdâ€ è¾“å‡º: â€œbbâ€ æ€è·¯ åŠ¨æ€è§„åˆ’ åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸€å­—æ¯å’ŒäºŒå­—æ¯çš„å›æ–‡ï¼Œç„¶åæ‰¾åˆ°æ‰€æœ‰ä¸‰å­—æ¯å›æ–‡ï¼Œå¹¶ä¾æ­¤ç±»æ¨ã€‚ var longestPalindrome = function(s) { var start=0; var maxLength=1; var len=s.length; if(s.length<2){ return s; } var dp=new Array(len); for(var k=0;k<dp.length;k++){ dp[k]=new Array(len); } for(var i=0;i<len;i++){ dp[i][i]=true; if(i<len-1&&s.charAt(i)==s.charAt(i+1)){ dp[i][i+1]=true; start=i; maxLength=2; } } for(var strlen=3;strlen<len;strlen++){ for(var i=0;i<=len-strlen;i++){ var j=i+strlen-1; if(dp[i+1][j-1]&&s.charAt(i)==s.charAt(j)){ dp[i][j]=true; start=i; maxLength=strlen; } } } return s.substring(start,start+maxLength); } ä¸­å¿ƒæ‰©å±•ç®—æ³• å›æ–‡ä¸­å¿ƒçš„ä¸¤ä¾§äº’ä¸ºé•œåƒï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å›æ–‡å¯ä»¥ä»ä»–çš„ä¸­å¿ƒå±•å¼€ï¼Œæœ‰$2n-1$ä¸ªè¿™æ ·çš„ä¸­å¿ƒï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬å­—æ¯å’Œå­—æ¯ä¹‹é—´ï¼‰ å–ä¸­å¿ƒç‚¹å‘ä¸¤è¾¹æ‰©æ•£çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ±‚å‡ºå…¶æ»¡è¶³å›æ–‡çš„é•¿åº¦ã€‚ var longestPalindrome = function(s) { if (s === '') { return ''; } let start = 0, end = 0; for (let i = 0; i < s.length; i++) { let len1 = calc(s, i, i); let len2 = calc(s, i, i + 1); let len = Math.max(len1, len2); if (len > end - start) { start = i - Math.floor((len - 1) / 2); end = i + Math.floor(len / 2); } } return s.substring(start, end + 1); }; function calc(s, i, j) { while (i > -1 && j < s.length && s[i] === s[j]) { --i; ++j; } return j - i - 1; }

function deal(n) {

}

(1) L<=MaxLen,åŸå¸‚æ•°é‡(L+1)

function deal(n,l,arr){
    var maxLen=0;
    var dp=[];
    dp[0]=0;
    for(var i=0;i<n-1;i++){
        dp[i+1]=dp[arr[i]]+1;
        maxLen=Math.max(dp[i+1],maxLen);
    }
    if(l<=maxLen){
        return (l+1);
    }else{
        return Math.min(n,maxLen + Math.floor((l- maxLen) / 2) + 1)
    }
}

function deal(arr){
    var count4=0,count2=0;
    for(var i=0;i<arr.length;i++){
        if(arr[i]%4==0){
            count4++;
        }
        if(arr[i]%2==0){
            count2++;
        }
    }
    if(count2==arr.length||count4>=parseInt(arr.length/2)||count2+count4>=arr.length){
        return 'Yes';
    }else{
        return 'No';
    }
}

1ã€tè·Ÿsä¸åŒ,ä½†æ˜¯é•¿åº¦ç›¸åŒ
2ã€tä¹Ÿæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆæ³•çš„æ‹¬å·åŒ¹é…åºåˆ—
3ã€LCS(s, t)æ˜¯æ»¡è¶³ä¸Šè¿°ä¸¤ä¸ªæ¡ä»¶çš„tä¸­æœ€å¤§çš„ å› ä¸ºè¿™æ ·çš„tå¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨å¤šä¸ª,å°æ˜“éœ€è¦ä½ è®¡ç®—å‡ºæ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶çš„tæœ‰å¤šå°‘ä¸ªã€‚

è¾“å…¥æè¿°:

è¾“å…¥åŒ…æ‹¬å­—ç¬¦ä¸²s(4 â‰¤ s.length â‰¤ 50),ä¿è¯sæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆæ³•çš„æ‹¬å·åŒ¹é…åºåˆ—ã€‚

è¾“å‡ºæè¿°:

æ€è·¯

è¿™é“é¢˜çš„é¢˜å¹²å¤ªé•¿äº†ï¼Œä½†å…¶å®æ²¡é‚£ä¹ˆå¤æ‚ã€‚æ ¹æ®é¢˜æ„ï¼Œè¦æƒ³ä½¿å¾— LCS æœ€å¤§ï¼Œ åˆ å»ä»»æ„ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦å³å¯è·å¾— $LCS = |s| - 1$ ï¼Œå†æŠŠè¯¥å­—ç¬¦æ’åˆ°ä¸åŸæ¥ä¸åŒçš„ä»»æ„ä½ç½®å¯ä»¥ç»´æŒåŸé•¿åº¦ï¼Œè€Œä¸å½±å“ LCS çš„è®¡ç®—ã€‚

function deal(str){
	var res=new Set();
	for(var i=str.length-2;i>0;i--){
	    var arr=str.split("")
	    var temp=arr[i];
	    arr.splice(i,1);
	    for(var j=arr.length-1;j>=0;j--){
	        arr.splice(j,0,temp);
	        if(vaild(arr)){
	            res.add(arr.join(""))
	        }
	        arr.splice(j,1)
	    }
	}
	if(res.has(str)){
		res.delete(str);
	}
	return res.size;
}
function vaild(a){
    var stack=[];
    for(var k=0;k<a.length;k++){
        if(a[k]=="("){
            stack.push("(");
        }else{
            stack.pop();
        }
    }
    return stack.length==0;
}

å‚è€ƒLeetcode22 æ‹¬å·ç”Ÿæˆ

ç»™å‡º n ä»£è¡¨ç”Ÿæˆæ‹¬å·çš„å¯¹æ•°ï¼Œè¯·ä½ å†™å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œä½¿å…¶èƒ½å¤Ÿç”Ÿæˆæ‰€æœ‰å¯èƒ½çš„å¹¶ä¸”æœ‰æ•ˆçš„æ‹¬å·ç»„åˆ

/**
 * @param {number} n
 * @return {string[]}
 */
var generateParenthesis = function(n) {
    var ans=new Set();   
    generate(n,0,0,"",ans);
    return Array.from(ans);
};
function generate(n,left,right,ret,ans){
    if(left+right==2*n){
        ans.add(ret);
        return ;
    }
    if(left<n){
        generate(n,left+1,right,ret+"(",ans)
        if(right<left){
            generate(n,left,right+1,ret+")",ans);
        }
    }else{
        generate(n,left,right+1,ret+")",ans);
    }
}
